name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior R&D Engineer with 8 years of experience, adept in developing advanced solutions utilizing **C++**, **C**, and **GIT**. Skilled in **STM32** development and **MFC** for creating robust applications in embedded systems, ensuring optimal performance through effective **electronics design**. Proven ability in problem-solving and communication within cross-functional teams to drive project success.
In addition to core technical skills, I leverage my background in full-stack development, including **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, contributing to solutions that integrate AI/ML capabilities for enhanced predictive analytics. My experience includes utilizing cloud platforms like **Azure** and **AWS**, implementing microservices architecture, and driving CI/CD automation for efficiency. Committed to maintaining compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS while delivering high-quality, secure applications.
